entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: ENE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
